name: Sambandh Health Foundation
briefDescription: Sambandh Health Foundation is an independent health foundation and charitable trust dedicated to understanding mental illness and addressing mental health. Our goals are to build the capacity of people living with mental illness and their families, to educate the public about mental health/ mental illness and to advocate for improved treatment and community supports. Sambandh currently offers the following support programs:1.Sambandh Family Self-help Groups - meet periodically to share their experiences and support each other to better understand mental illness and its effect.2.Community Integration Center - a day support recovery centre designed to help people living with a mental illness.3.Outreach Program - home visits and support
